articles.title: GLOBAL FRIENDS: Pandor and Lavrov meeting – South Africa defends planned military drills with Russia and China - Daily Maverick
articles.description: PRETORIA, Jan 23 (Reuters) - South Africa's foreign minister on Monday deflected criticism of joint military drills planned with Russia and China, saying that hosting such exercises with "friends" was the "natural course of relations".
articles.content:
Naledi Pandor made her comments during a meeting with Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov, who was visiting South Africa 11 months after Russia’s invasion of Ukraine.

articles.title: Court dismisses fugitive Atul Gupta’s bid to obtain South African passport - TimesLIVE
articles.description: Home affairs minister Aaron Motsoaledi on Monday welcomed the Pretoria high court’s judgment that held Atul Gupta was a fugitive from justice and therefore does not qualify for a South African passport.
